title: Simple Sans Serif that seems simple but has me stumped
author: D dog

comments.content: I know it's an old story, but I love how type designer Vincent Connare comically named Trebuchet after medieval catapults.
Right on. Thanks John! Do you have a link to that story?
One more question. Is Trebuchet a font available on most systems? I've noticed it just tonight on several blogs.
Trebuchet is considered one of the Microsoft Core Fonts for the Web so yes: it can be found on almost every personal computer.
